name: Mushroom Soup
ingredients: 1 lb of Mushrooms chopped 6 cubes of Chicken Bullion
1/4 tsp garlic salt 2 cups or more of noodles
2 Tlb Flour 3/4 cup heavy whipping cream or Milk
steps: Put 3/4 of the chopped mushrooms, butter, onions and salt in a pot and cook for 5 mins. Add 2 Tlb flour and 6
cubes of chicken bouillon and 6 cups hot water and bring to a boil. Stir in the rest of the mushrooms and 1/4 tsp
salt and pepper. Reduce heat and cook for 15mins.
Cook 2 or more cups (to your liking) noodles. Add to the soup when done. Stir in 3/4 cup heavy whipping cream
